scripts.dev: concurrently "cd app && pnpm run start" "cd layout-app && pnpm run start" "cd react-app && pnpm run start" "cd vue-app && pnpm run dev" "cd foo && pnpm run dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd app && pnpm run build" "cd layout-app && pnpm run build" "cd react-app && pnpm run build" "cd vue-app && pnpm run build" "cd foo && pnpm run build"
scripts.preview: concurrently "cd app && pnpm run preview" "cd layout-app && pnpm run preview" "cd react-app && pnpm run preview" "cd vue-app && pnpm run preview" "cd foo && pnpm run preview"
scripts.postinstall: concurrently "cd app && pnpm install" "cd layout-app && pnpm install" "cd react-app && pnpm install" "cd vue-app && pnpm install" "cd foo && pnpm install"
